commitResults.messageTitle: Add colour customization to the box component (#1647)
Give an easy syntax to center-align (#1657)
commitResults.messageBody:
Text content is centered by wrapping an HTML element around said text
(if it is not contained within one already) and applying some class
(e.g., `text-center`) to it.

Users who frequently use center-aligned text frequently on their 
website(s) would find it tiresome to do so.

Let's add a simple syntax rule to easily mark text to be center-aligned.

Using a syntax rule requires less typing to be done by the users than
using a component markup, for example.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix running functional tests in packages/cli (#1645)
commitResults.messageBody:
Functional tests are failing when invoked under packages/cli.

Let's set TEST_MODE = true within test.js and updatetest.js to
output beautified HTML for comparison and make the tests pass again.

Use of cross-env TEST_MODE=true in package.json has been removed
in favor of inline configuration.

Some part of the existing cli code was written to patch behaviors
previously unsupported by Commander.js. The setting of custom
header and modification to help text is now possible with newer
version of Commander.js.

Let's update the version to "^8.1.0" to make use of the added functions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug-report issue template file path (#1658)
commitResults.messageBody:
The file path to `bugs/index.md` is outdated.

Let's fix it by updating the path in the bug-report issue template.

The workflow guide contains broken links to the design section. The
instruction on how to manage dependencies is not comprehensive.

Let's fix the broken links and include more details on how to add,
update, or delete a dependency.

Adding contributors and displaying them prominently is a
great way to show appreciation to open-source contributors.

Let's integrate the all-contributors package and set it up to easily
include all future contributors.

I have added all existing contributors (except dependabot[bot]).

Build console progress bar doesn't show when using 'gitbash on
MinTTY' terminals. The issue stems from the node-progress package.

Let's patch the package and keep it within packages/core/lib to
resolve issues with the display, which can affect many developers
using Gitbash on MinTTY.

The solution is a reasonable compromise as the patch PR at
node-progress has not been accepted for more than 2 years.

Update docs to include double quotes for diagram example (#1624)
Adopt lazy loading for Pic component (#1626)
